attributes.action: Ban the production and sale of rawhide
attributes.additional_details: So many dog owners don’t realise how Rawhide is produced and aren’t aware of the potential dangers. Rawhide has no nutritional benefit but can contain toxic chemicals. I believe Rawhide poses a massive risk to dogs and therefore should be banned.
attributes.background: Rawhide can be dangerous. It’s hard to digest and can remain in their system causing blockages and has been known to kill. It’s a by-product of the leather industry, Rawhide isn’t meat, it’s a leather chew. It can cause teeth breakage when pressed or glued as it can be very dense and hard.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Harriet Harman KC MP
